name: petrologically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the scientific study of the origin and structure of rocks: These rocks are petrologically and chemically similar to those found on nearby islands. Over the last forty years, thousands of ancient stone axes found by archaeological research teams have been examined petrologically.
More examplesFewer examplesThe selection includes some rather unusual and petrologically interesting rock types.Many of these volcanic systems are petrologically distinct.Although petrologically interesting, these rocks are outside the scope of this paper.
